mapper.select:
select if(built_type.id is null,null,1) as is_defaulted, if(find_in_set(built_type.id,project.built_type),1,0) as is_selected, built_type.type_name as name, built_type.* from maoding_web_project project inner join md_type_built_const built_type
project.pstatus = '0'
and find_in_set(project.id,#{id})
and project.id in
#{projectId}

select if(built_type.id is null,null,0) as is_defaulted, if(find_in_set(built_type.id,project.built_type),1,0) as is_selected, built_type.type_name as name, built_type.* from maoding_web_project project inner join md_type_built_custom built_type on (find_in_set(built_type.id,project.built_type))
project.pstatus = '0'
and find_in_set(project.id,#{id})
and project.id in
#{projectId}
